name: The Man with the Golden Joystick - Dragon & TRS-80 CoCo versions
name_original: The Man with the Golden Joystick - Dragon & TRS-80 CoCo versions
description:
The ZX Spectrum game, the Man with the Golden Joystick, starring RetroHitch has been converted to the Dragon and TRS-80 Coco machines by the very talented Pere Serat.

This is a platform game  in the style of the classic 8-bit platformers from back in the day.

The game is free, but if you do play & enjoy it, please consider making a small donation to the mental health charity Safe in our World: https://tiltify.com/@sloanysoft/sloanysoft-safe-in-our-world

You can watch & follow RetroHitch here: www.twitch.tv/retrohitch
